H0.text: Sublimation is the transition from solid to vapor.

H1.text: Vaporization is the transition from solid to vapor.

H2.text: Deposition is the transition from solid to vapor.

H3.text: Ionization is the transition from solid to vapor.

A4.text: Sublimation is the transition of a substance directly from the solid to the gas state, without passing through the liquid state.

A5.text: The reverse process of sublimation is deposition (also called desublimation), in which a substance passes directly from a gas to a solid phase, without passing through the liquid state.
